mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.parent_id AS pid, t1.parent_ids AS pids, t1.sort, t1.dep_name AS depName, COUNT(t2.dept_id) userCount FROM sys_department t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t1.id = t2.dept_id AND t2.`status` = 1 GROUP BY t1.id ORDER BY t1.sort DESC

SELECT t1.id AS userId, t1.username, CASE WHEN t2.user_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS checked FROM sys_user t1 LEFT JOIN sys_department_user_rel t2 ON t1.id = t2.user_id AND t2.department_id = #{depId} ORDER BY t1.id DESC
